mapper.sql: a.fcd AS "fcd", a.fname AS "fname", a.address AS "address", a.location AS "location", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.enddate AS "enddate", a.dyp AS "dyp", a.drp AS "drp", a.fdyp AS "fdyp", a.sdyp AS "sdyp", a.tdyp AS "tdyp", a.mxatmp AS "mxatmp", a.mnatmp AS "mnatmp", a.avgtmp AS "avgtmp", a.z AS "z", a.q AS "q", a.stnm AS "stnm", a.dep AS "dep", a.spcount AS "spcount", a.dpcount AS "dpcount", a.mpcount AS "mpcount", a.chcount AS "chcount", a.sarea AS "sarea", a.carea AS "carea", a.elose AS "elose", a.lgtd AS "lgtd", a.lgtd AS "lttd", a.remark AS "remark", a.typ AS "typ"
mapper.select:
SELECT
,p.pid AS "pid", p.pname AS "pname",p.fpath AS "fpath",p.disc AS "disc" FROM IA_Z_FLOOD a left join rel_p_flood d on a.fcd = d.fcd left join IA_P_BASE p on d.pid = p.pid
1=1
and a.fname like '%'+#{fname}+'%'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
order by a.startdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IA_Z_FLOOD( fcd, fname , address, location, startdate, enddate, dyp, drp, fdyp, sdyp, tdyp , mxatmp , mnatmp , avgtmp , z , q , stnm, dep, spcount, dpcount, mpcount, chcount, sarea, carea, elose, lgtd, lttd, remark, typ ) VALUES ( #{fcd}, #{fname}, #{address}, #{location}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{dyp}, #{drp}, #{fdyp}, #{sdyp}, #{tdyp}, #{mxatmp}, #{mnatmp}, #{avgtmp}, #{z}, #{q}, #{stnm}, #{dep}, #{spcount}, #{dpcount}, #{mpcount}, #{chcount}, #{sarea}, #{carea}, #{elose}, #{lgtd}, #{lttd}, #{remark}, #{typ} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IA_Z_FLOOD SET fname = #{fname}, address = #{address}, location = #{location}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, dyp = #{dyp}, drp = #{drp}, fdyp = #{fdyp}, sdyp = #{sdyp}, tdyp = #{tdyp}, mxatmp = #{mxatmp}, lgtd = #{lgtd}, lttd = #{lttd}, mnatmp = #{mnatmp}, avgtmp = #{avgtmp}, z = #{z}, q = #{q}, stnm = #{stnm}, dep = #{dep}, spcount = #{spcount}, dpcount = #{dpcount}, mpcount = #{mpcount}, chcount = #{chcount}, sarea = #{sarea}, elose = #{elose}, carea = #{carea}, remark = #{remark}, typ = #{typ} WHERE fcd = #{fcd}
